data.text: It's a fun game & I'm enjoying the challenges of play. I level completed both the Bronze and Silver Levels in only 3 days, but I'm not getting bumped up to the gold level to play. Why not? This game also has a lot of ADs (up to 1 minute long) which I paid to have removed, yet I'm still seeing ads. UGH! But if I'm not going to be bumped up to play further levels, I want my ADs money back since I'll no longer be playing this game...

The ads ARE annoying, but for most of them, you can skip through if you catch the forward tab on the upper left first. In terms of gameplay, it was cool for a while, but I kept wondering why i was trying to win the tournaments. It's for coins, helicopters or hints that I don't need. Races are impossible to win if you don't go ad free. There needs to be...more to the game, something to retain interest, to work towards. It's a good pick up game when you're bored, but otherwise...eh 🤷

Just started playing because it looked good to keep my brain active.. it's exactly that! Love it so far!! At Level 26 I noticed at the top, "Moves: 4" OMGosh, got nervous and started messing up, but on track; don't think about it! Ads per most games, but you can "X" out of them. Love that if you crash, you don't have to start over completely (so far). I'll see how it goes and maybe update later. Keeps your brain active, not just another "pass the time" game. So far, absolutely recommend!

This game is really challenging and you know a good time passer but the ads are insane after you get to level seven or eight they play an ad after every single level. I get the concept of playing ads to get boosters that's great that's a choice. having to watch a 30-second ad after every two to three minute game is absolutely insane. I understand that's how they make it free play but they need to make the ads optional. I will be deleting. The ads are CRAZY an a deterrent from enjoymemt.

The problem with ALL these games. More time is spent viewing ads than playing the game!! I've been hit with so many ads/pop-ups and redirects I've actually lost where my game was! You have to be in the right headspace for these games cuz the inundation of the ads will make you want to drop kick your computer catapult your laptop and throw your droid at the wall!! NO!!! Seriously! OH yeah your opt out of receiving adds works the exact opposite of what you want. You guys ask for our emails so you

The number one thing you need to know is even if you pay for the game there are still ads you have to watch for bonus levels. this annoys me. I want to pay for a game and just have it. it is a good mindless challenge game. actually feel like it could be a little bit more difficult but I've enjoyed it for a little stress relief activity

It's got a nice idea for a puzzle game. I'm simply too old to deal with intrusive ads that just really want you to purchase the game. I have deleted it and will never play it again. You might as well just charge people for the base game because sitting through ads is just ridiculous. There are plenty of other fun and free games out there that don't puke capitalism all over you.

While clicking off the adds, a one step purchase button popped up just where you are supposed to click. I've just purchased by mistake with no option to back out. I like the game, so I didn't seek a refund thinking I'll at least have no adds moving forward however, the adds are still here even after downloading the new version. Unprofessional.

Fun game but (1) add every 2 levels, which is about every 60 seconds, (2) sometimes the adds are LONG... 30 second add or longer every 60 seconds is nuts, and (3) once you master the basics it's easy, doesn't seem to get much harder the further you go.

Pros: Good puzzle game. Can be tricky to complete. Online play to watch an ad to obtain bonus levels is OK. Cons: Forced online game play for each level, and ads play on EVERY round. Suggestions: 1. Give player the option of playing offline, or to play online for bonus levels after ads. 2. The traffic light & pedestrian are good difficulties. A suggested difficulty would be adding a timer for the player to make moves as fast as possible. Overall: Too many ads. Uninstalled. :(

I, also, liked this game, but the multiple adds between each game were very annoying. I decided to pay the $4.99 on 9/25/2023, but I'm still getting all the adds. If this isn't resolvable I guess I'll delete this game. Several others have made this complaint previously, but it's still happening. Update. I now don't get adds, but also can't play any BOSS levels. Nope, I'm going to delete. This game seriously is fraudulent. Collects money to remove adds, but after paying the adds are still there.

The ads are extremely excessive! Even early in the levels, the ads are bombarding. You spend more time viewing ads than actually playing the game to see if you want to pay for the ad free version. About the game itself, it's a nice, easy puzzle game that I think I would enjoy. The excessive ads knocked it down a couple of stars.

the gameplay is slowed down by a barrage of advertisements, but aside from that there is no interruption when you are trying to finish an individual level. most levels are 10 points so it is very welcome when a 30 pointer pops up. simple premise: clear the traffic congestion. this can be a relaxing game unless you are racing someone or playing against the clock. i like the game and recommend it in spite of its limitations.g

It's okay. Very, very easy, but if you just want to turn your brain off and move cars, it's still a good way to kill a few minutes. Main incentives to spend money seem to be skipping ads, both because ads are annoying and because there are rewards for finishing a series of levels more quickly than other players, and ads obviously slow you down. I haven't used a single coin or item in 98 levels, so I'm not sure why you'd spend money on those, but they aren't forced via unfair levels.

Update: This game was a great way to pass the time until I reached level 980 or so, then not so much. Yes there are ads, but they aren't obtrusive and you get used to them and in order to play a bonus level you have to watch an extra ad. Well somewhere around level 980 the extra ad can't be found and you are forced to skip the bonus BUT once you skip the level there IS an ad before you can play the non-bonus level. I have uninstalled the game and will find a different way to pass the time

Great puzzle game and perfect time waster. Easy to learn but hard to master. But once you get the hang of it, you'll fly through levels. One BIG complaint ...I paid to remove the ads. However, if I want to do any multipliers, the ads are CRAZY LOOOONG. They are literally 1+ minutes long. That's a bit much. Especially for a game I paid in to.

Way too many ads. Ads after every level are forced on you. I refuse to watch them, but the game won't let you go into airplane mode. So I exit after every level and restart. I refuse to watch ads I didn't agree to. Cars also don't always work when you touch them. It is a fun game, but the developers need to cut down the ads. They already get revenue from ads that you opt into (to get more moves, loot, etc) yet they push it with unsolicited ads in between. Makes it feel cheap and not legit game.

I absolutely love this game & I'm truly sad to have to delete it. It plays great & the ads really aren't that bad. Sometimes I even played several levels without a single ad. However, my battery was falling out pretty badly so this morning I tested to see what the issue was. In just 30 minutes of playtime I lost about ⅓ of my battery life. A short while later it was down to 40%. No matter how much I love the game - I just can't keep a battery killer on my phone. I wish miss it very much.

I want to give this game 5 stars. It's really fun, but only when it's working. Over and over and over again the app just quits mid game. I am ok with ads but this game seems to have more than most and many cannot be skipped. You have to watch an ad to play the levels with bigger prizes. When the app quits during these specific ads, you can't play that level. When you open the app again, you can click the ad as many times as you want, it will not work. You have to click on skip, no extra prizes.

WARNING - AVOID Like most of the "free" games of this type, you will spend a LOT more time watching, and clicking through, ads, than you will spend actually playing the game. If you don't mind getting only 4 minutes of gameplay every 10 minutes (ie. the other 6 minutes is 'ads'), then, by all means, install/play this...but, for those of you who actually want to PLAY the games, DEFINITELY look elsewhere.

I like this game but there are just way too many ads to enjoy this game!! There are ads for everything, long ads, extremely annoying ads and ads to even play some levels. I know you need ads but the sheer amount of ads is just ridiculous especially when you're doing levels that involve time. Another annoying issue is all your flashing attention getter's along the sides. You ruined a good game. Will be uninstalling it.

I like this game. I find it relaxing. Too many ads. Even though I paid the $4.99!!! Would like to see more challenges. Maybe more stop lights & pedestrians. Boulders were a nice touch. Don't like so many repetitive games. Also, I don't GET how the # of moves are calculated. Sometimes I'm assigned waaaay more than I will use even if I hit multiple cars. And other times I'm not. But overall I like this game. It's easy & addicting.

The game started off being fun but after I reached a certain level now it tracks how many moves you can make to complete a level. Uninstalling the game, too many ads, too many popups asking you to buy the "no ads" feature. After each game play there is an ad. I understand that's how you earn money but after awhile it is annoying.

The game itself is okay, possibly even fun, but you cannot play it offline because it absolutely requires that you look at ads. Unless, of course, you want to pay to play add free, but not all of us have the money or the internet for that. This game is predatory, and even though the puzzles are challenging... Ish... And somewhat fun and satisfying, the game is not worth it when there's absolutely no reason to even have to be online to play it, other than ads.

I won't beat a dead horse about the absolutely insane amount of ads. After literally every single level. And the fact it's sooo easy even hundreds of levels in. But has anybody else noticed the ads are all basically false advertisement? There were a couple of ads that popped up for games that I thought might be fun to play. So I downloaded them. Only to find out that the game the ad was for, is NOT the game that downloaded. It downloaded totally different games.

Traffic Escape was a fun - stress-free game. I played it up to the platinum level. Then the game stalled with 'you' at 24. It wouldn't advance past that number. I uninstalled it and tried again. Same thing happened at the bronze level at number 59. Sadly, your game has a glitch. You need to update that. Was fun, advancing in the levels. Not fun anymore. Please fix your glitch!!

This game has LOTS of bugs; one that's EXTREMELY annoying is that music starts spontaneously playing & won't stop even when I exit the game. When ever the music plays, I can't hear anything else on my phone. Also, every time I tap on something that has an advertisement, I get an error message saying 'Ad Not Loaded Yet', even if I try to tap it multiple times. 😒😠

It never gets any harder. 3000 levels in and not sure why you would need the hints or the helicopters. There is nothing to purchase with the coins except harder levels that really aren't harder and once you've done all those there is nothing to use the coins for. They could make it harder if they had more pedestrians moving at different speeds and more stoplights and dump trucks. I kept playing because I thought it would get more difficult but it does not.

No more bonuses after level 225. Really hurts you if you are competing. They have weekly games to see who can get the most points and challenges where you race to 30 games. That runs constantly with nice prizes for 1st 2nd and 3rd. Basically, it's a logic puzzle where you move cars out of a parking lot. They have arrows on them, so they can only go in that direction. If you like puzzles, you might like this game. I'm obsessed, lol 😆

I was in a race with others and on the 30th lap. I was 3-4 levels ahead of the next person. And stupid farm town animated and and took up a large size on my phone and there was no X to back out and leave. I was madly press anything but I kept getting back out of ads to write to unity. After many taps. The race was over I came in 2nd. This is a race, if casual play ok, I wait for the 30secs. Pissed off

fun puzzle game, I got addicted right away. easy to learn and master. Could use a bit more challenge, but it's still entertaining and relaxing. took forever to finally hit the pedestrian- I just needed to know what would happen (you can either watch an ad to revive the stunned humanoid or restart level). ads aren't more annoying than any other game app. has only glitched once, I restarted game and it was fine. bottom line, even though it's repetitive, it's still one of my go to games.

Fun to play! I even enjoy the game when I make a mistake and crash. The only drawback is the advertising is impossible to get out of at times. I have to close the app out and reload to continue to play.
It would be cool if we could simply choose the level. I want the hardest available level all the time. And I want no pedestrians or traffic lights. If you give me those options, I'll buy it! 😀

I've now edited my review again after the 3/14/24 update Who changed his many moves you get to make every level so difficult that you can barely get them done in the allotted moves. Don't crash. Oh and it seems that some of the pedestrians move quicker too. If the objective was to get less players you may succeed

I admit I was hooked, and I did purchase the "no ads" for it but only because I really like the game. Ideal for the person who is a "puzzler". Since the last I have to say 2 things. They changed the game up. Some changes make sense, like changing back ground or car colors. Others ruin it. I was in first place with 2240 pts. Missed one day and now have 0 points nearing the end of tournament. Also the hard and super hard kvls that used to be 20 & 40 pts are only 10 now. Not worth playing.

Disappointed so far. I like what I see of the game. However, beginning at level 15, when the level was completed the NEXT icon disappeared and the game didn't advance on its own to the next level. I closed the game & restarted. The following few rounds of that, clicking where the NEXT should be advanced the level, but after a few more repetitions, even that disappeared. This happened about every 3 levels after 15. No way to win any challenge that way! Fix it so I can happily play & give 5*****.

I love this game to the point I have become very addicted to it, I find it hard somedays to stop playing. It is a easygame to play. I do find the adds are pointless and very annoying when they play every 2nd level plus they do go on for far to long.

I have played this for a few months now. This is nothing more than an ad machine. The games are fun but only require 20-30 secs to solve. In between nearly all the games are multiple ads that run longer than the game. There is a tier system but is reset every week. The skill level of the games don't change no matter what you do But the maddening thing is the ads! I don't care if this is a free app with the accompanying "is it's free they have to cover costs" mantra. It's too much! Avoid this!

On completing a level reward must be added properly. Add is coming up on completing a level then it shows you are rewarded with this much coins but it is not adding.. This is one of the worst bug I have ever seen .. Update 29/2/2024 It is just repeating the same level thinking we can't remember so it is a cheating app. Please don't trust. They are cheating. Uninstalling now.

Fun game but too many ads. Uninstalling. More time watching ads than playing. If you want to do a race to complete 30 levels, then don't have ads in between every other level after you have the big long one at the beginning.

Pros: Fun game to challenge yourself with others or just play to play. You have the option to race against others. Cons: Too many full 30 sec ads! There should be a way to bust out of the ad after 5 seconds if we don't want it. There's no way to contact support to report a bug, like the current one where Challenge Modes do not properly add the coins earned after the last update. Thinking it was me I refreshed the game & went from winning Legends the last 3 times, back to ZERO! NOT HAPPY!!

3/4/24. Using the 3X button, video (Spanish Cryptogram ad) locks up after viewing 30 second ad - can't get reward, can't back out! All one can do is exit game and come back in. If we have to watch all the ads, then they should exit at end of ad! Not my first complaint about this type of error. Three times and it's uninstalled.

the game plays exactly as advertised which is refreshing. Buuuut... you already know where this is going. It let me play the first 9 levels before an ad and that was awesome, then after that every 2 levels an ad. Less than a minute of gameplay before you get interrupted, seems like a fun puzzle game but I'm going to be uninstalling

Is a good game,but not challenging, to easy.Have the opportunity to become great if they deviate from the grid idea,jumping to roundabouts or more complex situations. I spent few pounds to get rid of the adds and help the developers.

Too bad. For 1 day we had challenging levels in Legend. Must have been the update day. I imagine that's why the individual scores went crazy. Now back to very easy games with way too many moves per level. Legend should be far more challenging. March 13 Great to see the improvement in Legend. Not particularly happy about spending money to play and especially when I activate the 2x multiplier 5x and it says I only did it twice? I want credit for what I did.

Not at all like ad. 2 dimensional, no brightly colored car you need to get out of a parking jam like they have shown. Points system is strange as I always start in last place by behind by hundreds of points. There is a spin wheel that's never explained. It's my feeling in all these games, as they are all so similar, start of so stupidly easy and get more difficult and are really never like the ads. We as users should be able to pick the level we want to start with after the basic into.

Three leyers os adds after each level. 5 seconds level, 20 seconds adds. So if you wanna play adds - try it. If not - don't even install. UPD. No, it's literally impossible to play. To play for 10 min you have to watch adds 25 min. One add was impossible to skip and it never ended. I had to restart the app to get rid of it. This is the first app that stayed on my phone for 30 minutes and was completely removed. It was not created for playing, it's created fot displaying adds

it's a cool game. what makes it somewhat challenging is that each scene looks completely the same but tricks the eyes and, therefore, the mind. the cross walks and the stop lights with the pedestrians, not to mention the earth movers are the best way of distraction for the driver. always look both ways before you pull out, use your blinkers, and brake ahead of time.

I downloaded this program because it kept popping up as an advertisement. while I was playing another game. it looked good. The basic game is just that very basic. you try to move your vehicles so they don't crash into other vehicles. and do it with a limited number of moves. every combination that is given to you is solvable. I have timed how long it took me to solve a game board and it varied between 8 seconds to 39 seconds. at this point I've played over 500 games and many of them repeat

Good game for problem solving and for a way to kill time. One issue I've come across is occasionally there is a page where the game doesn't fit on the page and tapping the cars along the edge is very difficult and sometimes you can't see what direction they have on them, so it's a blind tap, if you can tap them.

almost every mobile game ad I see is NOTHING like the actual game. it makes no sense. however, traffic escape is simple, free and JUST like the ad, which made me wanna download. its not much, but a great puzzle game, very simple and fun

I like the game. I'm almost at level 700. My mistakes are from me trying to be fast. I wish there were instructions about the helpers, so I've made it this far without them. Most ads are almost tolerable so far, and I haven't had to spend any $.
Ads are every other level and priced at 6.99 USD, which is crazy given it still keeps the ads on the optional rewards. First app I've ever seen where removing the ads doesn't remove all the ads. Smh.

Great game for the first 200 games, then the adverts start at game 290 the adverts last for 45 seconds as soon as you complete a game then the adverts, whilst I appreciate adverts pay the bills, to play a game for say 45 seconds then have to watch an advert for another 45 seconds is too much, I will uninstall it after writing this, and look for another game similar!!!

It's a fun game, but after a while, the levels start to become repetitive. I've completed all of the challenge levels and over 10,000 of the main levels, all without using any hints or helicopters. After being a fixture at the top of the legend league for the last few months, I figure it's time to retire from this game and try something else.

The amount of ads in this game is ridiculous. There is very little actual game play. You play one level and then have to sit thru several ads in order to advance a level. I don't think people playing these games for free should be penalized like this. Sitting thru ads for royal match every 30 seconds is beyond stupid.

If you're going to make a playable ad make it so people can actually play the damn thing. Click 2 cars and then it goes to the play store? I'm sure you'd get more downloads if people actually could play for a minute or so.
More glitches or" bugs" than a player can deal with..game crashes more often than not..the ONLY reason that I have not uninstalled yet its a fun game. Ads are more of a need to keep it free.

Best game, just love it the grafics could use a little help. But it helps my coordination, thinking, just all round good . My attendance is on the game an it's getting better, I love it, I don't care what anyone else say.

The worst app that I have played . At the end of a frame you get counted stars for finishing . But I this game you can watch your score not change and where the pieces go must be one of their favorite players .. Tell you more about your cheating ?? There's plenty of it

Good game, however the levels done get any harder as you progress. Very easy game, I am up to level 260 and each level has been completed in under 30 seconds. Good concept but needs to be more challenging. Also lots of ads but that's not a reason not to play, need to make money some how!

Very fun game! I'm enjoying this a lot. Maybe for some DLC in the future you could add some 80's cars that us older gamers would enjoy. Cars that look similar to say...the General Lee, or K.I.T.T. or the A-Team van.

Fun. Time waster. Not difficult. Ad remover helps. Edit: After playing more I am of the opinion that most of the other users you see on the competition boards are just fake CPU users. Obviously I can't prove it but I have strong suspicions. It doesn't take away from you enjoying the game except that I think they are doing this to entice you to watch more ads and/or buy stuff so that you can beat the fake users on the leaderboard. Which is shady.

Game has repetitive maps and difficulty is low. You are not playing against other players. The game tops out at Legend League. There is no need to pay for anything. As per normal adds are plenty and some can go over 60 seconds.

0 Stars for this....The sexual content in the ads is offensive. You need to keep better tabs on the people you are allowing to put ads on your site. The ads are bad enough with ads every 1 to 2 games and sexy but this makes it even more frustrating. Children play this game. Why are you allowing this not to mention that you are allowing ads to force the internet open without my permission. I will be uninstalling if this is not fixed.

It's OK as a means to while away some time. Not very challenging, it's a sequencing game. You get daily tasks to earn a few powerups, but much of them are about watching ads. You can start a level race but you have to watch an ad. You can get a timed point doubler, but that's another ad. The pedestrians and traffic lights are just irritating, meaning you have to either restart the level or use up some coins, and they mean you don't get as much value for the timed boosters. Hey, more ads!

It's fun for a minute. Then there seems to be a glitch of some sort where every level you play, gives you, AND THE PLAYERS ABOVE YOU, the same points. So if you're not in the lead, you can not get in the lead, because you are giving points to everybody. Not just you.

Adding to review; I am so mad that you are now giving people the option of buying there way into the lead. First you could buy 2000 coins and now it is 20,000. Stop this. I work hard and long at this game. I really like this game. Have deleted all my others so I can devote my time. One thing I do not like is that there is no in-game support. Had a problem, at level 7532, only one Boulder and the truck ghosted it, went right through. Had to leave the game and then come back in.

Good way to pass the time and/or de-stress. But I notice the earned points don't always get properly added to the scoreboard at the end of each level. I've completed multiple levels where the score never increased, which is a bit annoying.
I had this over a week. Paid $4.99 Ad free version. So way different ❤️. Instead of those 45 second ads, I only have to watch 60 second ads and some don't let me back in the game.

I enjoy the concept of this game. It has the capacity to be quite enjoyable. However, with the amount of ads in this app, the players that download this game should be the ones being paid to play! And it's a whopping $6.99 to remove the ads! No, thank you! I've been through 100+ levels. I'm retiring this app.

Very fun game, although a little too easy! I like that you can watch an ad for additional items and features. However, it is a little bit annoying to have to watch an ad between almost every single level and $6.99 to play ad free is a lot! But overall, it's an enjoyable game to play!

Too many ads. They start by giving you no ads for several levels then ask you to rate the game. Only after they ask you to rate the game do they start to play ads after every level and ask you for $7 to get rid of the ads. This practice is deceptive. Ads are understandable, but tricking you into rating before you understand how many ads there are is immoral.

Is zero stars possible? I made a lot of effort to ensure this game WASNT installed through their intrusive and relentless ads, but here we are. One of the ads in this game insists on a survey to win something from Amazon, and won't "go away" without it. Very unethical, so I won't be playing, definitely won't be joining the Amazon contest, and I wonder why Google even adds this game to their platform.

I really like this game. What I don't like is the lengthy ads that do not give a way to opt out of their videos. I pay my phone bill. I don't want to be forced to watch ads that give no choice. I don't mind ads as they pay fir the game. However the lengthy ones are a waste of my time, battery, and data

Fun at first and the tournaments are fun and fast but the rounds are very repetitious. What the developers think are "super hard" rounds are not really very hard at all. So the game gets old after a while.

What's up with the ads AT EACH AND EVERY LEVEL? and also at every damn click of what features you're trying to use! Please know that it's terribly annoying and instead of having people download your featured ads, they'd just uninstall altogether because of how damn annoying the ads are.
Very playable (small fee for no intrusive ads). Requires concentration more than logic as you never really have to think 3 moves ahead - except perhaps when shunting rocks with bulldozers.

This game is great fun at first, until you realize first that you're only ever playing against bots, not other human players (and the bots always play EXACTLY the same way, so they are easy to beat), and second that the games do not increase in difficulty as you raise through the levels. Would be great if games were maybe timed at higher levels, or you had fewer turns, or A LOT more old ladies crossing! As it is, it's far too easy to win, so gameplay gets predictable, dull and tedious fast.

Enjoyed playing this game until the latest upgrade which changed the appearance of my screen. I just don't find it as appealing anymore, and combined with what seems like an increase in both the number and frequency of ads (as well as auto downloads of some games when I hit the exit button after the ad runs), I'm deleting this game. Shame as I really enjoyed it in the beginning.
Game was OK, except that each level takes 10-30 seconds followed by a 30 second to 1 minute ad. You spend more time watching BS ads, than playing the actual game.

You shorten the bonus time and then add 3 more ad breaks. Lately, it hangs up on a black screen and you have to leave the game to continue play. You completely messed up a good game. Your developers need to put it back and keep hands off. Fix the messed up ads!

I paid for this game to remove the ads, but to my dismay, they throw an add at me about every third level. Adds that are advertising other games and items that have nothing to do with this game! Disappointed! It has now been 8 days and I am still getting ADDS after paying for this game!!!!!

Ads are constant and very long. Some ads run for over a minute. Some ads are broken and hang the phone, requiring closing and reopening the game. Some of the ads FORCE the user to visit the Google Play page for the game in the ad. The game itself is pretty fun to play, but don't plan to win ANY of the "races" unless you pay to eliminate the ads. While you wait for the ad, you lose.. The tactic here is to overwhelm the user with ads until they give up and pay the $5 ransom to eliminate them.

Fun game, however is scoring is a mystery. I just completed all 7 levels of the Trophy League, finishing first in ALL categories, but at the end it said I finished 2nd...had 4280 points higher than the 2nd place finisher. How do they figure that's 2nd place??? Plus they need to shorten the time on individual ads. I didn't mind them to get a reward, but WAY too many of them...and repetitive. If I wanted Royal Match or Wordscapes, I would have installed them! Don't badger me to get them!

The game doesn't get any harder at each level. Is entertaining the first few rounds, but gets boring after realising that none of the levels are getting harder or even changing at all. Even the landscape/background stays exactly the same. Too many ads, constantly redirecting me to download an app I never clicked on. Pretty useless app if you ask me
Not bad, for the first 1000 levels... Afterwards, it's all the same, or looks like it... Managed to get past level 3000 (easily), won top level 3 times (also easily), and got bored 😴.

I enjoy the game itself but, the ads are extremely long then it goes into a loading screen which goes into another ad before getting back to the game. More time spent on navigating through all this than actually playing the game.

Nice logical puzzle. Could be much more interesting with dynamic collision detection and the option to quickly move an object out of the way if you see a collision is about to happen. Currently, the clear way is only statically detected at the time of clicking on a vehicle. I am convinced that all other players are computer generated. They never change position, with only small differences in score. No human competitive behavior.

This is a really fun game. I really loved it at first, but after a certain level it just doesn't get any more difficult. I wish they would add more challenging levels. Even the challenge mode isn't difficult, and all you win in challenge mode are helicopters and hints and I haven't used those ever, so they're just piling up. So the 150/500 coins for challenge mode isn't even worth it. Please make more challenging levels.

The gameplay itself is really fun, the levels are mixed with easy and more challenging randomly as you progress. As for the ads (free version) I understand the purpose of them, but there is pretty much an ad after every level as you progress. Most of the ads have a loud volume compared to the game, and no option to mute them. I end up turning my tablet volume off because it is very annoying. And the ration of coins received (few) compared to needed to buy "extras"(many) is ridiculous.

Its way to easy. No real human apponents just bots. Even the super hard levels are easy. I wasted $8.49 to have the ads removed. There's no real challenges. Done over 5000 levels and they seem to be the same, no hard challenges. Needs to have timed games. It doesn't deserve 1 star.

Bot driven. Could get score above the Bot until today's update when the scoring became unrealistic. I had actually played up into "Legend" status because I was curious if the levels would become more difficult, but they didn't. Even though I never made any purchases, their ads to buy also had a price increase within the last two weeks. It is as an Ad monster.
good incentives and marking of levels. I thought it deduct for the wrong move , it didn't. it gives you other chances to correct your moves.

A bit of a one trick pony. I enjoyed the process of working it all out, but when you have done it a few times, it all become very familiar. I'll happily recommend it as a bit of fun, something to dip into every now and then.
Fun game. Ads are not our od control. I just wish it got more challenging the further you get, or have a difficulty setting.

Pathetic. Internet access is made mandatory to spam with ads. There's nothing in the app that should require internet services, whatever happened to offline games. Unworthy. Useless. Bad. Worst. Unsatisfactory. Do not download. Uninstalling it right now. Waste of time.
This game works better on a larger tablet as opposed to a small phone. On a small phone, you may have to hit the cars multiple times to get them to move.

I used to like this game except for the excessive amount of ads. I know that's how you make your money but a 30 second ad for 10 seconds of play is ridiculous. Today the game is glitching and saying I'm out of moves and asking to pay 2000 points for 5 extra moves. 🤬

Get rid of the freaking ads! Especially royal match!! Would be an okay game if there wasn't 5000 ads every 2 seconds! Also, make the levels harder as you progress, at the moment level 1000 is the same as level 1!
